title: C'era una volta Studio Uno
overview: Rome, 1961. All of Italy hears 24,000 kisses and the thousand blue bubbles for the first time. Three girls meet in RAI: Giulia enters the opinion service, Rita as a seamstress and Elena as a dancer. Through the sentimental and working stories of the girls, we will witness the birth of Studio Uno, the variety par excellence of the 60s.
